body.para: To get get it back, open a new tab, and find your closed tab in the list of previous tabs: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=asj6FtK9B1U

quote.quotepara: Â Sometimes I close one of my tabs by accedent:( so, it will be very well if it is a button "cansel previous action". Does anybody know how to make it in Chrom?
